description: Two men standing next to each other, smiling, with a love heart floating in the air between them.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the couple with a heart emoji for two men is rendered with Apple‚Äôs hallmark 3D gloss and soft, rounded forms, creating a visually appealing representation of love and connection.
